documentation.text:
@title PinManager
 @dev A smart contract for managing pins
@dev Mapping to store pins by their ID

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the pin owner can delete the pin."

arguments.value: Only the pin owner can delete the pin.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the pin owner can delete the pin."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the pin owner can save the pin to a board."

arguments.value: Only the pin owner can save the pin to a board.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the pin owner can save the pin to a board."

arguments.value: Only the board owner can remove pins from the board.

devdoc.details: A smart contract for managing pins

params.boardId: ID of the board where the pin will be saved Requirements: - imageHash, title, and description cannot be empty strings - Board with the given ID must exist
params.imageHash: Hash for the image of the pin
params.title: Title of the pin

params.pinId: ID of the pin to delete Requirements: - Only the pin owner can delete the pin

getPin(bytes16).details: Get pin information by its ID

params.pinId: ID of the pin to get

returns._0: Pin struct containing pin information Requirements: - Pin with the given ID must exist

removePinFromBoard(bytes16,bytes16).details: Remove a pin from a board

params.boardId: ID of the board from which to remove the pin
params.pinId: ID of the pin to remove Requirements: - Only the board owner can remove pins from the board - Board and pin with the given IDs must exist

savePinToBoard(bytes16,bytes16).details: Save a pin to a board

params.boardId: ID of the board to save the pin to Requirements: - Pin with the given ID must exist - Board with the given ID must exist - Only the pin owner can save the pin to the board
params.pinId: ID of the pin to save

pins.details: Mapping to store pins by their ID
